page.title: 06NETHERSTOWE SCHOOL LICHFIELD
page.content: Netherstowe Comprehensive School is one of three large secondary schools in Lichfield. It was originally the Lichfield Central School and was renamed when it moved to a new building in 1963. In 1966 it became fully comprehensive. Today the school caters for 1100 children, from the age of 11 to 18. The school offers a wide range of subjects to Advanced level standards. Netherstowe has been noted in recent years for the success of its orchestra, who have on several occasions given concerts locally and toured part of America.
